thread.title_full: Trump names H.R. McMaster as national security advisor - Breitbart

title: Trump names H.R. McMaster as national security advisor - Breitbart
text:
by AFP 20 Feb 2017 0 20 Feb, 2017 20 Feb, 2017 SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER 
Washington (AFP) – President Donald Trump named US Army Lieutenant General H.R. McMaster as his new national security advisor on Monday, taking over the post left vacant after Michael Flynn’s resignation. SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER 
Speaking to reporters at his Mar-a-Lago residence in Palm Beach, Florida, Trump called McMaster, an expert on counterinsurgency warfare, a “man of tremendous talent and tremendous experience.” 
Flynn was forced to resign last week after misleading Vice President Mike Pence about discussions he had held with the Russian ambassador to the United States concerning US sanctions on Moscow. 
Comment count on this article reflects comments made on Breitbart.com and Facebook. Visit Breitbart's Facebook Page . BREITBART CONNECT
